escjava.dfa.cfd
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  escjava.dfa.cfd.Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
CodeNode, CouplingNode, ExceptionNode
public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a node in control flow diagram.

public Node(javafe.ast.GenericVarDeclVec scope)

Parameters:

Method Detail

shallowCopy

public abstract Node shallowCopy()
Creates a shallow copy of the node, the parents and children should remain emtpy. This method is used in cloning of the graph which takes care of the edges.

public NodeList getChildren()
Returns the children node list.

public NodeList getParents()
Returns parent node list.

Returns variable scope of this node.

Returns:
variable scope for this node represented as a variable declaration vector
